name: Village Saviours
description:
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

"Village Saviours' tells the tale of the rag-tag trio working together to keep their home safe from creatures coming from an unknown land. They fight alongside one another and are willing to travel the lands to keep the Polan Village safe. 

You play as Jani, a vigilant fighter and leader. Jani is used to fighting the endless creatures harassing her village and is ready to protect those she cares for. Jani acts tough but cares deeply for those around her, she takes charge and wishes to avenge her friend's deaths by stopping the creatures once and for all.

You are accompanied by Hetra the Witch and Kix the Rogue. Hetra is a headstrong and kind woman who has mastered her craft. She wants to help in any way she cans and uses her long-range magic skills to take out enemies with ease. Kix is a mysterious and quiet fighter with a big heart. She loves to fight up close with her Sai and takes great pride in the battles the trio face.

Together, the three are determined to keep their village safe and rid their world of the vile creatures threatening their lives.

Control Tips:

- To have your teammates follow and fight with you, just walk right up to them!

- Once you complete the wave of enemies, run to the left of the screen to move onto the next area!
